long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Escape the School - Chrome Extension
Ever dreamed of escaping the boring classroom and venturing into the vast world? Now you can with Escape the School, an exciting Chrome Extension!

Escape the School transforms your browser into a challenging adventure game. You'll have to solve puzzles, find clues, and overcome obstacles to escape school and explore the world beyond.

Install Escape the School now and begin your adventure!
